thread.title: Carlos Brígida
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Carlos Brígida

author: Carlos Brígida
title: Carlos Brígida
text: The shoes have the quality I'm already used to but this was first time buying online. Shoes were delivered as expected but, it's not at all OK that, at the end, I pay more than buying on a 'physical shop' as: delivery has to be payed - it should be free -, and bank account had an extra charge of around ten euros - I guess because it came from out of Euro zone. Both shouldn't exist.
